name: alfred-ai
description: Alfred AI - Backend, CLI, and Web applications

scripts.dev: echo 'Choose which service to run:' && echo '  npm run dev:backend  - Start the backend server' && echo '  npm run dev:cli      - Start the CLI application' && echo '  npm run dev:web      - Start the web client' && echo '  npm run dev:shared   - Build shared client package'
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:cli && npm run build:web
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../cli && npm install && cd ../web-client && npm install && cd ../clients/shared && npm install
